接口 ShardingStrategy

  • 所有已知实现类:

    public interface ShardingStrategy
    Sharding strategy.
    作者:
    zhangliang

    • 方法概要

      • getShardingColumns

        Collection<String> getShardingColumns()
        Get sharding columns.

      • doSharding

        Collection<String> doSharding(Collection<String> availableTargetNames,
                              Collection<RouteValue> shardingValues)
        Sharding.
        参数:
        availableTargetNames - available data sources or tables's names
        shardingValues - sharding values
        返回:
        sharding results for data sources or tables's names
